mapper.select: select * from chat_room order by chat_room_no asc
SELECT cr.chat_room_no FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN club c ON c.chat_room_no = cr.chat_room_no INNER JOIN club_member cm ON c.club_no = cm.club_no WHERE cm.club_member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT cr.chat_room_no AS chatRoomNo, c.club_no AS clubNo, c.club_name AS clubName, c.club_explain AS clubExplain FROM chat_room cr INNER JOIN club c ON c.chat_room_no = cr.chat_room_no WHERE cr.chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
